metadata.description: Workspace name for Log Analytics where Microsoft Sentinel is setup

variables._solutionName: Trend Micro Cloud App Security solution

dataFlows.transformKql:
source
| extend TimeGenerated = now()
| extend
                EventVendor="Trend Micro",
                EventProduct="Cloud App Security "
| project-rename 
                EventOriginalUid=log_item_id,
                EventCategoryType=service,
                EventType=event
| extend ScanType=tostring(message.scan_type),
                DstUserName=tostring(message.affected_user),
                SrcFilePath=tostring(message.location),
                DetectionTime=tostring(message.detection_time),
                TriggeredPolicyName=tostring(message.triggered_policy_name),
                TriggeredSecurityFilter=tostring(message.triggered_security_filter),
                EventOriginalResultDetails=tostring(message.action),
                EventResult=tostring(message.action_result),
                MailMessageId=tostring(message.mail_message.id),
                MailMessageSender=tostring(message.mail_message.sender),
                MailMessageRecipient=tostring(message.mail_message.recipient),
                MailMessageSubmitTime=tostring(message.mail_message.submit_time),
                MailMessageDeliveryTime=tostring(message.mail_message.delivery_time),
                MailMessageSubject=tostring(message.mail_message.subject),
                MailMessageFileName=tostring(message.mail_message.file_name),
                SrcFileName=tostring(message.file_name),
                FileUploadTime=tostring(message.file_upload_time),
                SecurityRiskName=tostring(message.security_risk_name),
                DetectedBy=tostring(message.detected_by),
                RiskLevel=tostring(message.risk_level),
                SrcFileSHA1=tostring(message.file_sha1),
                SrcFileSHA256=tostring(message.file_sha256),
                VirusName=tostring(message.virus_name),
                DetectionType=tostring(message.detection_type),
                RansomwareName=tostring(message.ransomware_name),
                TriggeredDlpTemplate=tostring(message.triggered_dlp_template)

connectorUiConfig.title: Trend Micro Cloud App Security (using REST API) (Preview)
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown: The [Trend Micro Cloud App Security](https://www.trendmicro.com/en_be/business/products/user-protection/sps/email-and-collaboration/cloud-app-security.html) data connector provides the capability to retrieve security event logs of the services that Cloud App Security protects and more events into Microsoft Sentinel through the Log Retrieval API. Refer to [API documentation](https://docs.trendmicro.com/en-us/documentation/article/cloud-app-security-integration-api-online-help-get-security-logs) for more information.

graphQueries.legend: Trend Micro Cloud App Security logs

sampleQueries.description: Get a sample of Trend Micro Cloud App Security logs

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: Read and Write permissions are required.

customs.name: Trend Micro Cloud App Security API access
customs.description: Access to the Trend Micro Cloud App Security API is required.

instructionSteps.description: Follow [Trend Micro CAS instructions](https://docs.trendmicro.com/en-us/documentation/article/cloud-app-security-integration-api-online-help-generating-an-authen) to create an Authentication Token.
instructionSteps.title: Connect to Trend Micro Cloud App Security API to start collecting logs in Microsoft Sentinel
